thread.title: Ground News - Words to be discussed from the former deputy: deputies who receive a salary of 90 thousand liras cannot get by! So what would anyone who receives a pension of 7500 pounds with the minimum wage do?

author: Aydınlık
title: Ground News - Words to be discussed from the former deputy: deputies who receive a salary of 90 thousand liras cannot get by! So what would anyone who receives a pension of 7500 pounds with the minimum wage do?
text:
Summary by Aydınlık Former MP Barış Yarkadas caused controversy with his statement. Yarkadas said in a statement that the deputies were suffering from livelihoods. After these words, what should the minimum wage earner do, who receives a pension of 7500 lire? The question came up. Here are the details... Share menu More

Yarkadas said in a statement that the deputies were suffering from livelihoods. After these words, what should the minimum wage earner do, who receives a pension of 7500 lire? The question came up.
